subject: Soccer
Hockey, Ice
Water Polo
Hockey, Field
lead_paragraph: When Tim Howard, the American goalkeeper for the English club Everton, scored a goal Wednesday, he joined a long list of mostly accidental scorers in soccer and several other sports.
snippet: When Tim Howard, the American goalkeeper for the English club Everton, scored a goal Wednesday, he joined a long list of mostly accidental scorers in soccer and several other sports.
